summary: This document is an email chain from August 13, 2019, between FBI personnel discussing a request from a Deputy Director (DD) for background information on Jeffrey Epstein's girlfriend. The emails coordinate providing a summary and scheduling an interview with her.

persons.name: Supervisory Special Agent FBI/NYPD Violent Crimes Task Force
persons.context: The sender of an email providing an update on the status of information regarding Epstein's girlfriend, noting she was not known to C19 prior to Epstein's death and that an interview is tentatively scheduled.

persons.name: Special Agent in Charge Criminal Division FBI New York Office
persons.context: The recipient of an email request to send information on Epstein's girlfriend to address questions from a Deputy Director (DD).

persons.name: Assistant Director in Charge 111111 Field Office
persons.context: The sender of the initial request asking for a short summary on Epstein's girlfriend, including her background and the timeline for a future interview.

connections.person1: Special Agent in Charge Criminal Division FBI New York Office
connections.person2: Assistant Director in Charge 111111 Field Office
connections.description: The Assistant Director requests information from the Special Agent in Charge regarding Epstein's girlfriend.

connections.person1: Supervisory Special Agent FBI/NYPD Violent Crimes Task Force
connections.person2: Special Agent in Charge Criminal Division FBI New York Office
connections.description: The Supervisory Special Agent provides an update to the Special Agent in Charge regarding the status of information on Epstein's girlfriend.

events.title: Email coordination on Epstein's girlfriend
events.description: FBI personnel exchange emails to coordinate providing background information on Jeffrey Epstein's girlfriend to a Deputy Director and schedule an interview with her.
personsInvolved: Supervisory Special Agent FBI/NYPD Violent Crimes Task Force
Special Agent in Charge Criminal Division FBI New York Office
Assistant Director in Charge 111111 Field Office

events.title: Tentative interview scheduled
events.description: An interview with Epstein's girlfriend is tentatively scheduled for Friday, August 16, 2019.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively seeking background information on Jeffrey Epstein's girlfriend in August 2019, shortly after his death.
Epstein's girlfriend was not known to an individual or entity referred to as 'C19' prior to Epstein's death.
An interview with Epstein's girlfriend was tentatively scheduled for Friday, August 16, 2019.
The request for information came from a Deputy Director (DD), indicating high-level interest within the FBI.
